content: Hi everyone, doodle poll for scheduling of next Primary Care Technical Working Group teleconference is here: https://doodle.com/poll/zgdn2yr3u66pb6c5. Please fill it out if you're interested in attending. We'll be trying to roll this into a regular time for a fortnightly call, I think

If anyone here isn't on the distribution list for the AU Primary Care TWG calls, the next call will be tomorrow (March 1) at 10am Queensland time (11am NSW/Vic/Tas, 10:30am SA, 8am WA, 1pm NZ). And if you'd like to be on the email list, just let me know, happy to add people
